Articles.Content:
Once upon a time, I configured a whole bunch of bindings for my DS4 controller using the in-game menu, but the associated settings.cfg file is long lost. I want to play with the new content using a controller for some piloting, but the process of setting it up and testing is very tedious, especially because you can only change the input bindings from the main menu, so there's a lot of waiting for loading while trying to test the many keybinds. On top of that, I'm neither a digital input nor aircraft expert.

But I'm sure there are members of the community with settings they're happy with and if anyone is interested in sharing, I will really appreciate it, and I'm sure others will too! You can also just copy/paste the relevant section of the file into the post.

Hopefully a bunch of people are willing to share this because everyone is likely to have very different preferences with this sort of thing.

 

Also, edit, if anyone knows if there's any way to adjust things so that the game allows combo inputs (eg LB+DPadDown = Landing Gear), or if there's a mod for it, I'd appreciate being pointed in the right direction.

Edited July 14, 2021 by Goldenself
